meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel mild astonishment or shock.
meanings.sent1: The magician always surprises the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: She quietly sneaked up behind him and surprised him with a birthday cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat surprises the dog by jumping out from behind the couch.
meanings.sent4: The sudden rain shower surprises everyone on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise from the fireworks surprises the sleeping baby.

meanings.definition: An unexpected or astonishing event, fact, or thing.
meanings.sent1: Opening the gift box revealed a lot of surprises for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent2: Life is full of surprises, so we should always be prepared for the unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party for Sarah was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: The plot twist in the movie was a real surprise for the audience.
meanings.sent5: Finding a hidden treasure in the old attic was a delightful surprise for the family.
